form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Banks (for himself and Ms. Collins) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the provision of certain additional burial benefits for individuals for whom an urn or plaque is furnished, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ensuring Veterans’ Final Resting Place Act of 2025.

section.header: Department of Veterans Affairs provision of additional burial benefits when an urn or plaque is furnished

subsection.text: Section 2306(h) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking In lieu of furnishing a headstone or marker under this section for and inserting In the case of; and
by striking paragraph (3) and inserting paragraph (2);

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (3) through (5) as paragraphs (2) through (4), respectively.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to an individual who dies on or after January 5, 2021.
